Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: The protestors said this statement is not present in the article, however, community members and organizations such as the East Oakland Collective nonprofit, cheered on Love's message.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: they cheered on Love's message; indicating support for Love's campaign

Unnamed Group of People.Sourced Statement: A few other candidates in the last-minute scramble were able to gather enough signatures to qualify for the ballot, among them Ken Houston.
Unnamed Group of People.Source Justification: they were part of the last-minute scramble to gather signatures; providing context to the challenging situation

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: The Elections Code and Oakland Ordinances only require that registered voters residing within the District sign the petition.
Document Sources.Source Justification: cited as the governing laws for the petition process; establishing the legal framework

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: Under the Voter’s Choice Act, registered voters on Election Day can cast their ballots at any vote center in Alameda County.
Document Sources.Source Justification: referenced to highlight the flexibility in voting process; contrasting with the signature collection process

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: While we are disappointed by the court’s decision not to place us on the ballot in November, I remain undeterred in my commitment to serving Oakland and our communities,” she wrote.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: District 7 council candidate and chief of staff for Councilmember Carroll Fife
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: candidate in the District 7 council race; providing her reaction to the court's decision

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: My understanding is that there are other candidates for this particular district city council who would’ve liked the opportunity to have more time to gather and submit signatures, and the process needs to be uniform,” he said.
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: presiding judge in the case; explaining his reasoning for the ruling

Named Person Sources.Sourced Statement: In an interview with The Oaklandside last week, Newton was resigned to his failure to gather enough signatures–he picked up 37–but said he would work with whoever came out ahead in the race to help improve the community.
Named Person Sources.Title of Source: nephew of Black Panther Party founder Huey Newton
Named Person Sources.Source Justification: candidate who failed to gather enough signatures; providing his perspective on the outcome

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The Alameda County Registrar is scheduled to send the final ballot for printing on Friday.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: responsible for managing the election process; providing key deadlines

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: Lawyers for the county asked for the hearing to be moved up to today, to ensure there was enough time to create the ballots.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: party in the court case; explaining their request for an expedited hearing

Named Organization Sources.Sourced Statement: The message was cheered on by several community members and organizations such as the East Oakland Collective nonprofit.
Named Organization Sources.Source Justification: supporting Tonya Love's campaign; indicating community backing
